participant_1.background:
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
I try to keep myself young by trying new things and surrounding myself with positive people.
I love to listen to the avert brother while working on cases for the federal court.
i had 128 tackles last year.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.

participant_2.background:
I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow.
I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family
i used to be in the marines.
i love animals.
i was born completely deaf.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hi! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. What are your favorite hobbies?
I enjoy swimming, reading, and spending time with my cat.
I love swimming too! What is your favorite thing about swimming?
I love the feeling of being in the water and the freedom of movement.
I agree! I also love being able to see the fish and other marine life.
That is one of my favorite things about swimming too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
I love historical fiction too! I am currently reading a book about the Civil War.
That sounds like a great book! I have read a few books about the Civil War, but I never seem to get tired of them.
Me neither! I find them to be so fascinating. What do you do for a living?
I am a lawyer. I work for the federal court.
That sounds like an interesting job! I am a housewife and I love it.
I am sure you are a great housewife! What is your cat's name?
That is a great name! I love it
